title: following provisions of the Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024 

(Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2024 (commencement) (no 3) order 2025

title: following provisions of the Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of
heading: 2. The 1st day of August 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of August 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 
2024) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 180; 

(b) Chapter 1 of Part 9. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 July, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [379] 3
